00011 namespace ibase

00015 template <class BaseComponent>
00016 class TVersionInfoBase: public BaseComponent, virtual public iser::IVersionInfo
00017 {
00018 public:
00019        typedef BaseComponent BaseClass;
00020 
00021        I_BEGIN_BASE_COMPONENT(TVersionInfoBase);
00022               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(iser::IVersionInfo);
00023               I_ASSIGN(m_slaveVersionInfoCompPtr, "SlaveVersionInfo", "Slave version info, unknown version information requests will be delegated here", false, "SlaveVersionInfo");
00024        I_END_COMPONENT;
00025 
00026        // reimplemented (iser::IVersionInfo)
00027        virtual bool GetVersionNumber(int versionId, quint32& result) const;
00028        virtual QString GetVersionIdDescription(int versionId) const;
00029        virtual VersionIds GetVersionIds() const;
00030        virtual QString GetEncodedVersionName(int versionId, quint32 versionNumber) const;
00031 
00032 private:
00033        I_REF(iser::IVersionInfo, m_slaveVersionInfoCompPtr);
00034 };
00035 
00036 
00037 // public methods
00038 
00039 // reimplemented (iser::IVersionInfo)
00040 
00041 template <class BaseComponent>
00042 bool TVersionInfoBase<BaseComponent>::GetVersionNumber(int versionId, quint32& result) const
00043 {
00044        if (m_slaveVersionInfoCompPtr.IsValid()){
00045               return m_slaveVersionInfoCompPtr->GetVersionNumber(versionId, result);
00046        }
00047        else if (versionId == iser::IVersionInfo::AcfVersionId){
00048               result = istd::RS_USE_VERSION;
00049 
00050               return true;
00051        }
00052 
00053        result = 0xffffffff;
00054 
00055        return false;
00056 }
00057 
00058 
00059 template <class BaseComponent>
00060 QString TVersionInfoBase<BaseComponent>::GetVersionIdDescription(int versionId) const
00061 {
00062        if (m_slaveVersionInfoCompPtr.IsValid()){
00063               return m_slaveVersionInfoCompPtr->GetVersionIdDescription(versionId);
00064        }
00065 
00066        return "";
00067 }
00068 
00069 
00070 template <class BaseComponent>
00071 iser::IVersionInfo::VersionIds TVersionInfoBase<BaseComponent>::GetVersionIds() const
00072 {
00073        VersionIds retVal;
00074        if (m_slaveVersionInfoCompPtr.IsValid()){
00075               retVal = m_slaveVersionInfoCompPtr->GetVersionIds();
00076        }
00077 
00078        return retVal;
00079 }
00080 
00081 
00082 template <class BaseComponent>
00083 QString TVersionInfoBase<BaseComponent>::GetEncodedVersionName(int versionId, quint32 versionNumber) const
00084 {
00085        QString retVal;
00086 
00087        if (m_slaveVersionInfoCompPtr.IsValid()){
00088               retVal = m_slaveVersionInfoCompPtr->GetEncodedVersionName(versionId, versionNumber);
00089        }
00090        else{
00091               retVal = QString("<") + QString("%1").arg(versionNumber) + ">";
00092        }
00093 
00094        return retVal;
00095 }
